sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FileText, FolderOpen, Users, TrendingUp, Plus, ArrowRight, Clock, Globe, Sparkles, Activity, Zap, BarChart3, Star, Upload, Eye, Share2, Download, Calendar, ChevronRight, Play, Bookmark } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const [recentDocuments, setRecentDocuments] = useState([ { id: 1, title: "Q4 Financial Report", fileName: "financial-report-q4.pdf", fileType: "PDF", createdAt: "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z", isPublic: false, owner: { username: "johndoe" } }, { id: 2, title: "Marketing Strategy 2024", fileName: "marketing-strategy.docx", fileType: "DOCX", createdAt: "2024-01-14T15:20:00Z", isPublic: true, owner: { username: "janedoe" } }, { id: 3, title: "Product Roadmap", fileName: "product-roadmap.pptx", fileType: "PPTX", createdAt: "2024-01-13T09:45:00Z", isPublic: false, owner: { username: "mikejohnson" } } ]); const [recentFolders, setRecentFolders] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Project Alpha", createdAt: "2024-01-12T14:20:00Z", itemCount: 12 }, { id: 2, name: "Client Documents", createdAt: "2024-01-11T11:30:00Z", itemCount: 8 } ]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalDocuments: 24, totalFolders: 8, sharedDocuments: 6 }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const StatCard = ({ icon: Icon, title, value, color, trend, description, bgGradient }) => (

{title}

{value}

{description}

{trend && (
{trend} from last month
)}
); const QuickAction = ({ icon: Icon, title, description, onClick, bgGradient, badge, delay = 0 }) => (
{badge && ( {badge} )}

{title}

{description}

Get started
); const FileCard = ({ document, delay = 0 }) => { const getFileIcon = (fileType) => { switch (fileType?.toUpperCase()) { case 'PDF': return '📄'; case 'DOCX': return '📝'; case 'PPTX': return '📊'; case 'XLSX': return '📈'; default: return '📄'; } }; const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }); }; return (
{getFileIcon(document.fileType)}

{document.title}

{document.isPublic && (
)}

{document.fileName}

{formatDate(document.createdAt)}
); }; const FolderCard = ({ folder, delay = 0 }) => { const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }); }; return (

{folder.name}

{folder.itemCount} items • {formatDate(folder.createdAt)}
); }; if (loading) { return (

Loading Dashboard

Please wait while we fetch your data...

); } return (
{/* Hero Header */}
Welcome Back

Your Digital
Workspace

Manage, share, and collaborate on your documents with ease. Your productivity hub awaits with powerful tools and seamless workflows.

{/* Stats Cards */}
{/* Quick Actions */}

4 shortcuts available
console.log('Create folder')} bgGradient="linear-gradient(135deg, #1A2A80 0%, #3B38A0 100%)" badge="New" delay={100} /> console.log('Upload files')} bgGradient="linear-gradient(135deg, #3B38A0 0%, #7A85C1 100%)" delay={200} /> console.log('Shared content')} bgGradient="linear-gradient(135deg, #7A85C1 0%, #B2B0E8 100%)" delay={300} /> console.log('Analytics')} bgGradient="linear-gradient(135deg, #B2B0E8 0%, #7A85C1 100%)" badge="Pro" delay={400} />
{/* Content Grid */}
{/* Recent Documents */}

Recent Documents

Your latest files and updates

{recentDocuments.length === 0 ? (

No documents yet

Start by uploading your first document

) : (
{recentDocuments.map((doc, index) => ( ))}
)}
{/* Recent Folders */}

Recent Folders

Your organized collections

{recentFolders.length === 0 ? (

No folders yet

Create your first folder to organize files

) : (
{recentFolders.map((folder, index) => ( ))}
)}
{/* Activity Feed */}

Recent Activity

Stay updated with your document activities

{[ { icon: Upload, action: "uploaded", item: "Financial Report Q4", time: "2 hours ago", color: "#1A2A80" }, { icon: Share2, action: "shared", item: "Marketing Strategy", time: "4 hours ago", color: "#3B38A0" }, { icon: Bookmark, action: "starred", item: "Project Roadmap", time: "1 day ago", color: "#7A85C1" } ].map((activity, index) => (

You {activity.action} {activity.item}

{activity.time}

))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
